titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to Isaac W. Scott
CWG13806

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; Folder 1865 Horse Settlements, Salaries, Ins. Bureau, Gen. Receipts, Correspondence Regarding Troops; Center Stack

body.p:
NO. 12.
The State of Kentucky,
To Isaac W Scott, Dr.

row.cell: For Salary as Surgeon General of Kentucky for one Month beginning January 1. 1865 and ending January 31 1865

body.p: The Quarter Master General of Ky will pay the above claim amounting to One hundred & fifty dollars from the Military Fund of Ky
I certify that the above account is correct and just, and that the articles were furnished as stated, and were necessary for the public service.

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 21 of February, 1865, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter=Master General for the State of Kentucky, the sum of One hundred & fifty dollars, and cents, in full of the above account.
(DUPLICATE.)
I W Scott Surg. Genl. Ky

No. 12.
150 No 32 Abstract "B"
Isaac W Scott
Dollars 150 x/100
Paid February 21 1865
